WorkflowAlert.name: WorkflowAlert
WorkflowAlert.description: Represents a workflow alert. A workflow alert is an email generated by a workflow rule or approval process and sent to designated recipients.

Description.description: A description of the workflow alert.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the workflow alert in the API.

EntityDefinition.description: Required. Available in version 34.0. The entity definition for the object associated with this WebLink.

EntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the entity containing the alert.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the package to uniquely identify the workflow alert.

SenderType.description: The type of sender. Values are: CurrentUser OrgWideEmailAddress DefaultWorkflowUser

TemplateId.description: A reference to an email template.
